title: [Security] CLI outputs user-supplied todo.text without sanitization in success messages

assessment.summary: Issue #2083 describes the same vulnerability as #2084 (CLI outputting unsanitized todo.text). The fix was already applied in commit eee53c0 which added _sanitize_text() calls to all three CLI success messages (add, done, undone commands at lines 98, 108, 113 in cli.py).
assessment.test_results: All 11 tests pass - the sanitization is working correctly
